attributes.additional_details: This man has not only served his country during WWII but continues to help it at the age of 99 by fundraising for the NHS. A clear example of someone who loves his country and has done his part.
attributes.background: Give Captain Tom Moore the knighthood he rightfully deserves.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
